Description: Worked flint blade, roughly rectangular, segmented blade, both short ends truncated, small abrupt retouch on dorsal right lateral. Remains of a dull coarse reddish beige cortex on parts of the dorsal surface. Medium brown coloured stone, fine-grained.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), Mound ß, D16 Q+P, surface (X)
